title: The Case of the Missing Twin 1
description: The erotic adventures of intrepid detective Miles Diamond kick off with The Case of the Missing Twin. Miles is a genius in the bedroom, although he is often at a loss when it comes to solving crimes. Unwilling to let his limitations stand in his way, Miles constantly finds himself in a variety of compromising positions with a cast of randy studs-each of whom harbors a secret of two of his own. Miles diligently sets about uncovering everything within reach as he tracks down the elusive and delectable Daniel Travis.
author: Derek Adams
